entry.title: Visualizing Artificial Intelligence
entry.quote: From robots to brains and lightning bolts, representing concepts related to Artificial Intelligence (AI) can be complicated. Noun Project recently teamed up with Essence, a data science and measurement-driven agency, for an Iconathon to create a new collection of icons that better represent key concepts in AI.

entry.title: How to recognize AI snake oil
entry.quote: Much of what’s being sold as “AI” today is snake oil — it does not and cannot work. Why is this happening? How can we recognize flawed AI claims and push back?

entry.title: Thoughtworks Technology Radar, Vol 21
entry.quote: Cloud: Is More Less?, Protecting the Software Supply Chain, Interpreting the Black Box of ML, Software Development as a Team Sport

entry.title: Let’s Practice Storytelling With Data
entry.quote: A conversation with Cole Nussbaumer Knaflic, who literally wrote the book on data storytelling

entry.title: The Architect of Modern Algorithms
entry.quote: Barbara Liskov pioneered the modern approach to writing code. She warns that the challenges facing computer science today can’t be overcome with good design alone.
